welcome.title: Welcome to StockSuite! üéâ
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to help you get the most out of your inventory management system. This will only take 2 minutes!

dashboard.title: Dashboard Overview
dashboard.content: Your command center! Here you'll see key metrics, low stock alerts, and recent activity at a glance.

sidebar.title: Navigation Menu
sidebar.content: Use this sidebar to navigate between different sections. Everything you need is just one click away!

categories.title: Organize with Categories
categories.content: Create and manage categories to keep your inventory organized. Think Smartphones, Laptops, Audio Equipment, etc.

items.title: Manage Your Items
items.content: Add, edit, and track all your inventory items. Each item shows current stock, value, and category.

transactions.title: Record Stock Movements
transactions.content: Track every item that comes in or goes out. This keeps your inventory counts accurate and provides valuable insights.

stockLevels.title: Real-time Stock Levels
stockLevels.content: See current stock quantities calculated from all your transactions. Never lose track of what you have!

reports.title: Powerful Analytics
reports.content: Visualize your inventory trends, top-selling items, and business insights with beautiful charts and reports.

settings.title: Customize Your Experience
settings.content: Personalize StockSuite with your preferences, currency settings, and account information.

completion.title: You're All Set! üöÄ
completion.content: Congratulations! You now know your way around StockSuite. Start by creating your first category or adding an item. Happy inventory managing!
